## Environment Variables Needed to Use Twilio

| ENV var name       | Default | Note |
|--------------------|---------|------|
| TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID | _empty_ |      |
| TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN  | _empty_ |      |
| TWILIO_NUMBER      | _empty_ |      |

### `send_to` and `check_key` Value

```json
{
  "phone_number": "xxxxxxx",
  "country_code": "xx"
}
```
